images.description: BMW 3 Series — compact executive sedan known for balanced handling and daily usability
BMW 5 Series — mid-size luxury sedan offering comfort, tech, and strong performance
BMW 7 Series — flagship luxury sedan with advanced features and refined ride
BMW 2 Series — compact coupe/convertible with sporty handling and practical everyday usability
BMW X3 — compact luxury SUV with versatile cargo space and engaging driving dynamics
BMW X5 — mid-size luxury SUV blending performance, tech, and family practicality
BMW Z4 — two-seat roadster focused on open-top driving enjoyment and sporty handling
BMW M4 — high-performance coupe tuned for track-capable speeds and sharp dynamics
BMW M5 — high-performance executive sedan delivering tremendous power and luxury
